reviews.review: tiene buena jugabilidad se puede ajustar la sensibilidad para cada persona, ademas de las actualizaciones semanales para arreglar los problemas del juego, malo es que si no tienes cuenta premium encontraras muchos hackers, no quiere decir que obtendiendo cuentas premium no te vayas a topar con hackers pero tendras pocas probabilidades

And here we go, after 10 years of fun on this game, it turn to s***. One game on two there is cheaters or smurf, ranks doesn't mean anything anymore, all of that ruin interest in this game. Valve only see interest in milking his community, selling skins, don't removing cheaters, don't improving their servers, and so on. The fun is dead, the game is dead, let's play Valorant.

Forget Valve. All Hail Rito.
